title: The Art of the Japanese package
brief_description: This film shows some fine examples of the traditional Japanese art of packaging with natural materials. Based upon “the Art of the Japanese Package” exhibition which toured Australia in 1979-1980. Suitable for Upper Primary-Lower Secondary students.
